## Setup

Run the following code to get started.

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
library(MASS)
library(mgcv)
library(tidyverse)
library(marginaleffects)

theme_set(theme_minimal())

options(
  knitr.kable.NA = "",
  digits = 2
)
```
